DIA_Worker_AraxosMine_02_HELLO_03_01: Couldn't you spare a fellow miner a few nuggets?
DIA_Worker_AraxosMine_02_HELLO_03_02: I have a small debt and who knows what will happen if I don't pay it off...
DIA_Worker_AraxosMine_02_HELLO_03_03: Several guards have already started threatening me!
DIA_Worker_AraxosMine_02_GiveOre_15_01: Here, I've managed to dig a few out already.
DIA_Worker_AraxosMine_02_GiveOre_03_02: Thanks a lot! I'll tell everyone what a good kid you are.
DIA_Worker_AraxosMine_02_GiveOre_03_03: Damn, that's not enough. The guards want more and more nuggets for their protection...
DIA_Worker_AraxosMine_02_AboutMine_15_01: What's the situation at the mine?
DIA_Worker_AraxosMine_02_AboutMine_03_02: I'll be honest with you - if it weren't for the royals sending most of the miners to the Valley of Mines, I'd be long gone by now.
DIA_Worker_AraxosMine_02_AboutMine_03_03: It's tough out here, but I don't even want to think about what they must be going through with the responsibility of mining ore for an entire army.
DIA_Worker_QA306_Back_03_02: Thanks to you, I was able to come out on top. Please take these few nuggets as payment of my debt and reward.
